00118 /***************************************************************************
00119  ***************************************************************************
00120  ******                 CORE FUNCTION NAME HANDLING                   ******
00121  ***************************************************************************
00122  ***************************************************************************/
00123 
00124 /* *** Core function pointer name *** */
00125 #define orxPLUGIN_CORE_FUNCTION_POINTER_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME) _orxCoreFunctionPointer_##FUNCTION_NAME
00126 
00127 /* *** Core function default name *** */
00128 #define orxPLUGIN_DEFAULT_CORE_FUNCTION_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME) _orxDefaultCoreFunction_##FUNCTION_NAME
00129 
00130 /* *** Default core function declaration *** */
00131 #define orxPLUGIN_DEFAULT_CORE_FUNCTION_DEFINE(FUNCTION_NAME)                               \
00132   extern orxDLLAPI void *orxFASTCALL orxPLUGIN_DEFAULT_CORE_FUNCTION_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME)()  \
00133   {                                                                                         \
00134     return(orxPlugin_DefaultCoreFunction(#FUNCTION_NAME, __FILE__, __LINE__));              \
00135   }
00136 
00137 
00138 /***************************************************************************
00139  ***************************************************************************
00140  ******             CORE FUNCTION DEFINITION HANDLING                 ******
00141  ***************************************************************************
00142  ***************************************************************************/
00143 
00144 /* *** Definition macro *** */
00145 #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00146 #pragma warning(disable : 4113)
00147 #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00148 
00149 #define orxPLUGIN_DEFINE_CORE_FUNCTION(FUNCTION_NAME, RETURN, ...)          \
00150   orxPLUGIN_DEFAULT_CORE_FUNCTION_DEFINE(FUNCTION_NAME)                     \
00151                                                                             \
00152   RETURN (orxFASTCALL *orxPLUGIN_CORE_FUNCTION_POINTER_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME))(__VA_ARGS__) = (RETURN(orxFASTCALL *)(__VA_ARGS__)) (&orxPLUGIN_DEFAULT_CORE_FUNCTION_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME))
00153 
00154 
00155 /***************************************************************************
00156  ***************************************************************************
00157  ******                   CORE INFO ARRAY HANDLING                    ******
00158  ***************************************************************************
00159  ***************************************************************************/
00160  
00161 /* *** Core info array begin macro *** */
00162 #define orxPLUGIN_BEGIN_CORE_FUNCTION_ARRAY(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)                                                                            \
00163   static const orxPLUGIN_CORE_FUNCTION sastPluginFunctionInfo_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX[orxPLUGIN_FUNCTION_BASE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX##_NUMBER] =  \
00164   {
00165 
00166 /* *** Core info array add macro *** */
00167 #define orxPLUGIN_ADD_CORE_FUNCTION_ARRAY(PLUGIN_SUFFIX, FUNCTION_SUFFIX, FUNCTION_NAME) \
00168   {(orxPLUGIN_FUNCTION_ID)orxPLUGIN_FUNCTION_BASE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX##_##FUNCTION_SUFFIX, (orxPLUGIN_FUNCTION *)&orxPLUGIN_CORE_FUNCTION_POINTER_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME), (orxPLUGIN_FUNCTION)&orxPLUGIN_DEFAULT_CORE_FUNCTION_NAME(FUNCTION_NAME)},
00169 
00170 /* *** Core info array end macro *** */
00171 #define orxPLUGIN_END_CORE_FUNCTION_ARRAY(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)                        \
00172   };                                                                            \
00173   extern orxIMPORT orxSTATUS orxPLUGIN_K_CORE_INIT_FUNCTION_NAME(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)(orxU32 *, orxPLUGIN_USER_FUNCTION_INFO **); \
00174   extern orxDLLAPI void orxPLUGIN_CORE_REGISTER_FUNCTION_NAME(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)()  \
00175   {                                                                             \
00176     orxPLUGIN_REGISTER_CORE_INFO(PLUGIN_SUFFIX);                                \
00177     return;                                                                     \
00178   }
00179

00181 /***************************************************************************
00182  ***************************************************************************
00183  ******               CORE INFO REGISTRATION HANDLING                 ******
00184  ***************************************************************************
00185  ***************************************************************************/
00186 
00187   #ifdef __orxEMBEDDED__
00188 
00189   /* *** Core info register macro *** */
00190   #define orxPLUGIN_REGISTER_CORE_INFO(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)                             \
00191     orxPlugin_AddCoreInfo(orxPLUGIN_CORE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, orxMODULE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, sastPluginFunctionInfo_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, sizeof(sastPluginFunctionInfo_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX) / sizeof(orxPLUGIN_CORE_FUNCTION)); \
00192     orxPlugin_BindCoreInfo(orxPLUGIN_CORE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, orxPLUGIN_K_CORE_INIT_FUNCTION_NAME(PLUGIN_SUFFIX))
00193 
00194   #else /* __orxEMBEDDED__ */
00195 
00196   /* *** Core info register macro *** */
00197   #define orxPLUGIN_REGISTER_CORE_INFO(PLUGIN_SUFFIX)                             \
00198     orxPlugin_AddCoreInfo(orxPLUGIN_CORE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, orxMODULE_ID_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, sastPluginFunctionInfo_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX, sizeof(sastPluginFunctionInfo_##PLUGIN_SUFFIX) / sizeof(orxPLUGIN_CORE_FUNCTION));
00199 
00200   #endif /* __orxEMBEDDED__ */
